1.title: Ushinawareta sonzai

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

1.plot: Yuji has vanished, and Bal Masque is gearing up for a final assault. Shana returns to Misaki City, believing he's still alive, but uncertain of what to do next as Outlaw prepares for the last battle.

2.title: Kitaru beki mono

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

2.plot: Sydonay destroys the Shanghai Outlaw forces. Meanwhile, the master of Bal Masque revives, and with Yuji's body. Yuji, however, doesn't seem all that upset by this...

3.title: Tabidatsu tame ni

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

3.plot: Yuji is in back in Misaki City. He visits all the places he used to go and remembers how he came to this point. At the same time, Margery detects the presence of a powerful Crimson Lord, and prepares for a fight.

4.title: Saikai to, kaikô to

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

4.plot: The Crimson Lord that appeared in Misaki City was Yuji. None of them are willing to believe it, until he wreathes himself in black flames and rises into the sky.

5.title: Toraware no fureimuheizu

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

5.plot: Margery's mind has been destroyed, and Shana captured by Yuji. Cut off, and with no support from Outlaw, Wilhelmina plots to infiltrate the Star of Darkness Castle alone.

6.title: Tanagokoro no naka ni

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

6.plot: Satou has gone to the Tokyo Outlaw to act as a messenger, but when he gets there he's locked in a room and held hostage. Outlaw wants to use him as bait to get Wilhelmina to help them, but Flame Haze Rebecca Reed has other ideas.

7.title: Shinmon

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

7.plot: A jealous Hecate attempts to kill Shana. Yuji tells her why he's keeping her alive

8.title: Kaisen

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

8.plot: The Grand Order reaches its second stage, and the forces of Bal Masque begin their assualt. They launch huge attacks both in Europe and Asia. Wilhelmina searches for a certain Treasure, which she believes to be the key to rescuing Shana.

9.title: Seirei-den e

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

9.plot: Striking through a hidden passage, Wilhelmina and her friends attack the Castle of Crystal Darkness while Yuji and Trinity are away. As they tear through the castle's defenses, Shana takes advantage of the distraction to escape.

10.title: Kôsaten

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

10.plot: The Crimson Lord Uval attempts to stop Shana from escaping. As she tears through his clones, she remembers her training with Margery.

11.title: Kikoeru, omoi

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

11.plot: Shana heads into the Divine Gate as the Outlaw forces attempt to take the castle. Decarabia, the commander of the Bal Masque armies, is forced to appear in our world to buy a few moments of time.

12.title: Chikai no kotoba

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

12.plot: Inside the rift between worlds, Shana is confronted by the powerful Crimson Lord, the Destructive Blade Sabrac. Shana goes on ahead and leaves her friends to fight it. Still, she's too late, and the Snake of the Festival revives...

13.title: Hazama e to hazama kara

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

13.plot: The Divine Gate is under attack, but who can prevent its destruction, and at what cost?

14.title: Taimei senpu

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

14.plot: The Snake of the Festival has returned, and all is lost. Yuji declares his Grand Order, and the remaining Flame Hazes attempt to retreat to the Heaven's Road Palace as Haborym follows.

15.title: Uchû no haisô

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

15.plot: Outlaw's last hope is to get the surviving members of its team to the Heaven's Road Palace and escape. But they're surrounded and badly outnumbered, and Thousand Transformations Sydonay is closing in. The task seems hopeless, but help is offered from a surprising source...

16.title: Futatabi, tatakai e

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

16.plot: The defeated Outlaw forces regroup at the Hong Kong International airport. Sophie gives them all four hours to make a decision

17.title: Dare ga tame ni

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

17.plot: As denizens all over the world head to Japan for the creation of Xanadu, Flame Hazes begin a campaign of airport terrorism to stop them. Meanwhile, Yuji goes to Misaki City where he meets with Yoshida. He needs her help for the final phase of his plan...

18.title: Tôsô no uzu

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

18.plot: Yuji is ready for his final declaration, and begins the process of creating Xanadu in Misaki City. The remaining Gods of the Earth help the heroes intervene, but will they make it in time?

19.title: Kaze ga yobu mono

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

19.plot: The battle over Xanadu intensifies. As Bal MasquÈ temporarily gains the upper hand, surprising faces show up to change the tide.

20.title: Sekai no tamago

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

20.plot: As Hyakki Yakou carries Kazumi off the battlefield, Earnest goes to meet with Rofocale. Rofocale is a servant of the God of Guidance, and he needs an oracle...

21.title: Hitotsu no ri

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

21.plot: Shana has altered the spell that creates Xanadu. In the new world, no one will be able to devour humans to gain their power of existence. To make sure that no one ever eats humans again, the Four Gods of the Earth start killing as many Denizens as possible.

22.title: Ihôjin no yume

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

22.plot: Hyakki Yakou is surrounded by thousands of Denizens as they seek refuge in the tower. Sale's battle with the professor comes to an end, as Shana's true plan is revealed.

23.title: Kami no yume

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

23.plot: Sophie's plan works, and the Thunderous Chant of Awakening speaks. But she speaks of something unexpected

24.title: Hate yori hiraku

episode of.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final (TV Series 2011–2012)

24.plot: The gate is open, and the Crimson Denizens have left for Xanadu. All that's left now is to settle things between Shana and Yuji. Yuji is intent on leaving Shana behind, and she's intent on stopping him...

imdb.plot outline: Yuji disappeared the fateful night he was supposed to choose between a life combating evil by Shana's side or as a normal teenager. He returns from near-death to lead the Crimson Denizens in a dubious plot to bring peace to the universe, but Shana isn't fooled. In an explosive reunion, the fiery warrior faces her unlikeliest of foes while Flame Hazes from across the world join forces to ignite a war that will determine the fate of all supernatural kind.
imdb.title: Shakugan no Shana III: Final
plot: Yuji disappeared the fateful night he was supposed to choose between a life combating evil by Shana's side or as a normal teenager. He returns from near-death to lead the Crimson Denizens in a dubious plot to bring peace to the universe, but Shana isn't fooled. In an explosive reunion, the fiery warrior faces her unlikeliest of foes while Flame Hazes from across the world join forces to ignite a war that will determine the fate of all supernatural kind.

Arriflex 435 Xtreme, Zeiss Master Prime and Angenieux Optimo Lenses
